item.description:
Sahara Club Singles Dance

Friday Jan. 6th. 9:30 pm. to 1:30 am.

$5. cover charge.

No dress code

Sahara Club & Restaurant,

978-683-9200

near Bates St,

88 Oak St.

Methuen, MA 01844

Host: Steve Obermiller 603-491-1962  ob@tds.net

Steve O. wrote:

         This is an evening of dancing at a new location. The Dj for this Event ( John B.) has invited us to the Grand opening of this Singles Dance. Because he knows we love to dance.   This is a new venue for us. So, I don't know how easy it will be to get and hold tables and chairs. So, please get there as close to 9:30 pm. as possible. As always, I will be doing the introduction as we can. Once we are all dancing. It gets a little difficult to introduce people. Also, I really can't reserve seat as yet for this.

The Singles Dance said there will be Dj play our favorite dance music and some type of entertainment. I believe there is a Cash Bar & a Cover Charge of $$5..
item.how_to_find_us: Look 4 the Meetup signs on our tables
item.name: Sahara Club Singles Dance
